member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_T43
member.summary: A 4.3 inch TFT display module with resistive touch for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_T43.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor for the module if touch is not connected.
member.remarks: The ordering of the RGB socket numbers does not matter (socket numbers are autodetected).
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the display's R, G, or B socket connected to it.
The mainboard socket that has the display's R, G, or B socket connected to it.
The mainboard socket that has the display's R, G, or B socket connected to it.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_T43.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor used if touch is connected.
member.remarks: The ordering of the RGB socket numbers does not matter (socket numbers are autodetected).
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the display's R socket connected to it.
The mainboard socket that has the display's G socket connected to it.
The mainboard socket that has the display's B socket connected to it.
Optional: the mainboard socket that has the display's T socket connected to it. This enables the touch panel capabilities.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_T43.Paint(Microsoft.SPOT.Bitmap)
member.summary: Renders display data on the display device.
member.param: The object to render on the display.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_T43.SetBacklight(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the backlight to the passed in value.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_T43.Width
member.summary: Gets the width of the display.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_T43.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of the display.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_T43.BBackLightOn
member.summary: Accessor for the state of the backlight
